cast.original_title: Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood
cast.overview: When Ashtray moves to South Central L.A. to live with his father (who appears to be the same age he is) and grandmother (who likes to talk tough and smoke reefer), he falls in with his gang-banging cousin Loc Dog, who along with the requisite pistols and Uzi carries a thermo-nuclear warhead for self-defense. Will Ashtray be able to keep living the straight life?
cast.title: Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood

cast.overview: When he loses a highly publicized virtual boxing match to ex-champ Rocky Balboa, reigning heavyweight titleholder Mason Dixon retaliates by challenging the Italian Stallion to a 10-round exhibition bout. To the surprise of his son and friends, Rocky agrees to come out of retirement and face an opponent who's faster, stronger and thirty years his junior. Rocky takes on Dixon in what will become the greatest fight in boxing history!
cast.title: Rocky Balboa

details.biography: Lahmard J. Tate was born in 1970. He is an actor and writer, known for Rocky Balboa (2006), Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood (1996) and Barbershop (2002).
details.name: Lahmard J. Tate
